summary.span: 为三维对象提供通用的变换支持。

span.span: Provides generalized transformation support for 3-D objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三维对象之间的转换通过发生和方法，这两种返回对象。Transformations between 3-D objects take place through the and methods, both of which return a object. 在三维之间的转换对象可能表示的 4 x 4 矩阵的情况下，方法返回的实例类。In the case that the transformation between the 3-D objects may be represented by a 4x4 matrix, the methods return an instance of the class. 类可以转换到和到。The class can transform a to a and a to a . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

returns.span: 如果 已变换，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同方法，此方法不会不引发异常，如果转换失败。Unlike the method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
